id.description: ID to match with the label.

aria-describedby.description: Optional ID to pair the Meter to its help text.

aria-label.description: Label text of the Meter (if not using a regular MeterLabel with `htmlFor` or `aria-labelledby`).

aria-labelledby.description: Optional ID to pair the Meter to its label text (if not using a regular MeterLabel with `htmlFor`).

element.description: Overrides the default element name to apply unique styles with the Customization Provider

maxLabel.description: Label displayed for max value. Only shown when this prop is passed.

minLabel.description: Label displayed for min value. Only shown when this prop is passed.

htmlFor.description: Pass the id of the associated Meter.

element.description: Overrides the default element name to apply unique styles with the Customization Provider

valueLabel.description: Custom value label of the Meter.
